content.detailedDescription: Saw 7 of these on the first. got a picture of what i think was another one traveling high and fast on 1/2/11. seemed like a large plane was trying to follow it but couldnt begin to keep up.
content.summary: Orange ball, second sighting in 2 days

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my workplace in the humble area, came out the back door for a cigarette break. noticed a very clear sky with several white jets creating contrails. visible in the early pics (around 2:00 pm). i took a few shots just out of curiosity. about 2 hours later, i came out and the contrails had turned into heavy cloud cover with a visible contrail jet still flying over. i took a few more pics, but did notice the odd glowing chevron shape above me. took some pics. later uploaded to computer and adjusted contrast (only) to see better detail, if any. i did not see the small egg shaped object when taking the pics. the chevron was just hovering/floating there but couldn't observe for a long time, i was at work.

the chevron struck me as an oddity and of course my mind started running on the reaction between the contrails creating cloud cover and this odd shape appearing overhead. who knows.

i am a digital designer by profession and i swear that nothing was re-touched or altered other than increased contrast and adding the red circles to highlight the anomaly. not even sure it was an object but it sure grabbed my attention. i am an avid skywatcher and have seen about 2o ufo's through the years. sadly, never had a camera to record anything. these were taken with an iphone4 at hd.

the pics are numbered as originally still on the iphone, in the order they were shot. the first set of pics lapsed maybe 3-4 mins. the second set (4:00pm) were rapid fire.

i uploaded the ones highlighting the objects(?) or whatever they are but all of the originals are available upon request. the archive is 37mb compressed, as they are hd.
content.summary: Jets creating contrails, i took pictures. and egg (?) shaped object showed, after a chevron shaped glow in the clouds showed up. photographed them.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11:45pm on january 1st, 2011 and i was outside of my house smoking a cigarette, enjoying the clear night sky and all of a sudden an orange glowing orb appeared from behind the trees. it was travelling from west to east and seemed to have a steady speed and a fairly high altitude, (maybe about as high as a commercial airliner, i'm not sure). as it passed over me i noticed that there was no sound coming from it, at least none that i could hear. i moved to a side street to keep sight of it as it travelled. from the time i first saw it to when it disappeared into the sky it seemed to maintain a straight path. at an arms length, it looked about as big as an eraser on a pencil. it was a glowing orange orb but when it was coming toward me i noticed a slight white blinking and when it passed me and i was looking at the back of it i noticed a slight red blinking. the whole event took about five minutes as it travelled across the sky.
content.summary: I saw a  round glowing orb travel across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out back to have a smoke and noticed light through the trees of the apartments behind my home. i first thought it was fireworks, but as i stepped off my back porch i could see it was an oval of light. the craft was heading west very low, silent and moving slowly. it had an odd glow to it so, i thought it looked like it could of been projected onto the could cover. i decided that i have read too many conspiracy theories about chemtrails and dismissed the idea of a it being a projection. just a bit after 7:00 pm. what i saw was an elliptical circle of solid white light with two large red lights centered on top and on bottom of the craft. it was rather big. i would say if you held a fist at arms length it was be as long as the widest part of your fist. the light was bright but seemed softened and glowing against the cloud cover. the craft was less than 1/2 a mile away and as low as a helicopter or lower. it looked to be just east of the i17 freeway and about a mile south of the interchange to the 101 freeway. my view was intermittently blocked by the large trees behind our home. i had seen a blimp a couple of days beforehand. thinking that it could be a blimp, i ran through the house telling my children and husband to come quick and look. we all went out and my husband saw a gimps of it. of course, he decided it was a blimp. he lifted our son onto his shoulders and the boy was able to get a good look at it. unfortunately my other child couldn't see it, as it was too far west and was then being blocked by buildings. the sighting lasted less than 5 min.

  i have never seen a blimp lit up this way. i have seen plenty of blimps at night and they always are lit in the center and displaying some sort of advertisement. if a blimp were to display a solid ring of light on it's side around the add space...Well the size and shape would match. this had no light in the middle of the ring and no adds. i just saw the metlife blimp this morning as it passed close by. the size, shape, speed and altitude were similar to what i saw last night. i also noticed that even in the daytime i could see the green positioning light and also the white strobe on the bottom of the cabin. i saw no faa required lights on the craft last night. as i looked at the blimp today i could envision how the ring of light would fit on the side of it but the large red light on top and bottom would be almost as big as the cabin underneath. i don't know how they could of had such a large red light on the top of the blimp. the craft last night was very obvious and looked stereotypically like an old hollywood saucer.
  so, was there a blimp in north phoenix last night just after seven and do they ever fly at night lit up like a flying saucer with no advertisement display? there were quite a few small planes in the air at the time we saw the oval of light. i called deer valley airport today and they only suggested i call back when the operator that was on last night is there tonight. i searched the web to see if anyone else saw a ufo or blimp in the area, but found nothing. i also tried looking for pictures of blimps at night and got nowhere.
content.summary: Oval light ring with red light on top and bottom. blimp with no advertisement??

content.detailedDescription: it was around 830pm at night iwas working at a variety store in belfair wa. 3 men came in dressed in clothes from the 1940s clothes ; there looks were perfect,no neck hair no 5 oclock shadow just perfect, talked perfect english asked if i was closing i said in about a half an hour,asked if it was all right to look around, i said sure, thay went up one isle and down the the other, one person would ask what is this used for,the other would say,this is a oil lamp, used for primitive lighting, the other would ask what are these,the other would answer,these are called a knife,fork,and spoon,used to consume foods, i could hear them all through the store asking questions,when thay dident know what a bath towel was i knew what was going on, all three came back up to me,looked at me,turned walked to the door,stoped,turned,and said god be with you, . i told my family what happened,my brother said god be with you is the long version of good by.  i have had other contacts sense i was around 3 or 4 years old.
content.summary: Three perfect looking  men 6ft. 2in. tall

content.detailedDescription:
On new year's eve, outside on porch with some friends at about 11:30 pm when we saw a large and bright red glowing ball of light with a distinctly different white light glowing from the very middle. the glow was extraordinary and the object appeared to be close to us (within 1-2 miles) based on the size it started as and how small it was when it eventually left our sights.

the red object appeared to be moving smoothly and very quickly from one side of our sights (about 30 degrees from the horizon) in the eastern sky and moved all the way across to the western sky and out of sight within about 45 seconds. 

approximately 10 people witnessed the object. it was noiseless, very fast and changed it's direction in an instant. it also seemed to rather close to us in the beginning and as it went westward it's distance from us decreased as well.

the light of this thing was very difficult to describe, but there was a distinctly white very bright light in the center, and the surrounding had red glow, equally as bright but taking up more space.Like a circle within a circle. no color blending either. very smooth flight, but changed directions very quickly and sharply.

happy new year!
content.summary: Super red glowball with white center over jenison/allendale mi.

content.detailedDescription: I was out back of my house smoking a cigarette and noticed a star shimmering. i noticed it turning different colors and kind of blinking. i couldnt see it clearly with my eyes so i got my video camera with 42x zoom and took a look. much to my surprise i saw a craft that looked like it had two windows and red light coming from inside. it turned and then turned into an orb of about the same size. the orb then went slowly higher and farther away. the orb was every color of the spectrum and looked to be swirling some how as well as pulsing like a heart beat. it stayed in the air for about 3 hours traveling slowly away and higher. i was afraid and nervous but got the whole thing on video. i slept with the camera near me because i thought someone might steal it from me and i would never be able to show anyone. i am willing to show the video to people but i honestly think its worth something. after i have watched the video frame by frame seceral times i have seen the cockpit and a shadow backlit as well as the skin of the craft ( bumpy)and roughly the size and shape of it.
content.summary: Could see vague details of windows and ext. of craft before it became orb.

content.detailedDescription: One additional witness.  i am a pilot... this was not a heilcopter or airplane.
content.summary: Obect appeared to be following the little harpeth river about 2000 feet high very large star like glowing light.. then very fast acceleration and altitude gain ..Ie gone in a flash

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 97 i went to pick my car up with my parents at a shade tree type mechanich shop on north kern street.  we seen a row of 6 to 8 lights in the sky for about 8 minutes.  then helicopters approached both sides of the lights and a couple minutes later it disapered and the helicopters left.
content.summary: Just a single row of lights

content.detailedDescription:
On new years eve i would say around 11:57 my girlfriend noticed outside of our bedroom window an star like object in the north eastern direction,when i went over to see for myself what exactly it was she was looking at.
i was only able to view the object in question for around 10 seconds but was able to conclude it was of an orange/reddish color,appeared "closer" than typical stars and was quite bright.
i would of continued viewing the object if not for the urges to watch the t.V. to see the ball drop and celebrate new years with my girlfriend although
little did i know my uneventful new years evening was about to become a whole lot interesting and the "star" from earlier was not done with us yet.
after the new years ball dropped we decided to go outside,walk down the street to the right of my street to watch the fireworks display off in the distance,after about five minutes we decided it was too cold to stay outside and turned around to walk back to my house
(it is relevant at this point to mention that when i came outside originally i did look for the star from earlier and could not find it where we had originally spotted it)

as soon as we turned around to go back home i immediately spotted an object directly ahead,"floating",slowly moving towards the right.I'd saw the object was about 100-150 yards away distance wise and surprisingly enough was what looked like an orange-ish/red fireball/energy/light spherical shape from what we could tell.It moved at an consistent speed slowly and we jogged towards it in disbelief,shock had just about overcame me for i was actually seeing and experiencing what was an ufo for the first time in my 28 years of life!

i was yelling for my girlfriend *(name deleted--cms/sg) to call my mother,call the house! i wanted someone else to see what we were seeing,as fate would have it this enigmatic evening my mother(highly skeptical)just so happened to walk outside of our house at the precise moment we were making our way towards the object(it was right above,in the middle of two parallel telephone poles,no higher than 20 feet for vertical reference,made no sound at all while moving) 
as the ufo continued to move north eastern away from us i don't know if it picked up speed or not but it eventually faded faster than it was initially moving when we first saw it.I am still amazed at what we saw the other night and i know with 100% certainty what i saw was not conventional aircraft,easily explained away as swamp gas,chinese lanterns,r.C. plane and no...It was not venus!
content.summary: Fireball-like object of an orange/reddish color moving low in the sky outside of home

content.detailedDescription:
Chris and i were driving south down bebout rd, when we spotted it directly southeast in the sky, it was huge, bright and stationary. the sky was clear. not a cloud. at first we thought it was a planet, but it was really bright. it seemed to change shapes as if rotating. it stayed in view as we turned east, it seemed to go behind us, then when we went north onto library road it moved.

the object grew bigger until it was an inch big , it created a huge bright halo of light behind it. i commented that it looked like an angel in the shy, one of those you see on a christmas tree. it was still there when i pulled in my home, but was gone when i went to the third floor to see it.
content.summary: It looked like two small objects together, on top of each other small triangle then big

content.detailedDescription: I had reported an incident a few days ago, dec. 30 2010, and at that time the object was an amber-orange color.  this time it was a bit more discreet and more of a white color.  i noticed it while outside (around 8:30p pst) and couldn't help but see the slow movement of what appeared to be a star.  i returned to the comfort of the inside of my house.  i went back outside at approximately 10p pst and the object was still in the sky, but directly above my house when i looked up.  i went under the eve of my house and poked my head back out and the object appeared to be following me in the sky.  it moved directly above me while standing outside and i could see it when i went inside the house too.  i am a bit nervous, because i feel like it was watching me.  like it could see me from above.  upon further investigation, looking at through binoculars showed me that it was indeed in our atmosphere and not a star phenomenon.  the object seemed to be moving with me in the sky.
content.summary: Noticed a bright star above my house that was moving.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from shreveport, la around 7:30 pm when my friend *(name deleted--cms/sg)noticed something in the sky. he pointed it out to me, so i began observing it. my other friends kept telling me it was a star, and i just couldn't accept that. the object was pulsating red, white, and green. when the green would flash you could see the disc-shaped outline. i watched it the whole way to minden, la. it didn't move at all. when i got home i walked to my backyard and watched it again. i also noticed another object to the left of it doing the same thing. i began to notice it move slightly from side to side, unlike the other stars in the sky i noticed the rays radiating from the object. i was amazed, it was like nothing i've ever seen before. i called a few of my friends to confirm that they were seeing they same thing, and they noticed two more from where they were in town. they agree the same, that was totally a ufo. it has been in the same spot, i don't have anything that could capture the ufo unfortunately. it's really cold outside too, and i've been watching it for well over two hours. i came inside just now to report it. hope everyone else gets to see something as amazing as this.
content.summary: Pulsating, moving side to side, red green and white

content.detailedDescription: We were having dinner on the back patio.  it was around 7pm.  i saw what i thought was a large firework that was moving up into the nw sky from behind the houses across the street.  i was watching to see if it would explode since it is new year's weekend.  however, it kept ascending and looked like a rocket with fire coming out.  as it ascended higher in the sky the fire dissipated and it moved higher and higher into the sky until it disappeared as a spot in the sky.  we are about 2 hours south of cape canaveral, so i went to check the nasa launch schedule and nothing was scheduled for today.  my husband and my niece also saw the object.  we were all baffled by what it could be.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Fireball,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like
content.summary: What initially looked like a large firework going up behind a neighbors house, continue to ascend and then move across the sky until out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on 127 between i-70 and eaton, ohio, i noticed an intensely bright object in the sky to the east. the time was 5:12 am, with sky conditions being very cloudy with no stars or the moon visible. the object showed no running lights or anything that would make it appear to be a conventional aircraft. object appeared to be stationary from my moving position. once i arrived at work, the object was still visible and stationary from the parting lot. total observation time was about 5 minutes. i lost sight of the object when i had to go inside.
content.summary: Bright stationary light on cloudy night. no movement for 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:30 p.M. december 24th, my wife noticed a reddish light in the sky and pointed it out to me.  my first reaction was that it was a helicopter, but she pointed out that there was no sound.  we listened as it approached, but there was nothing.  it approached from the northeast at what seemed a consistent elevation.  the light was much brighter than anything other than a low-flying craft, but not quite steady in intensity.  it didn���t have the green light, white headlight, or strobe of an airplane or helicopter.  the light wasn���t a point-source, and had the quality of a fire, flickering irregularly.  it was about 45 degrees above the horizon.  distance was hard to tell, but it seemed higher than a light craft.  it traveled southwest a little faster than the speed of a satellite.  the international space station came to mind, but i've seen that many times, and this was much brighter, very red, and clearly closer.  we kept watching.  it moved past north and away from us until it was northwest of us, and then it came to a full stop, about 20 degrees above the horizon.  it held that position for several minutes and the light became more varied in intensity.  my wife called our adult children outside, and although they didn���t see it move, they were quick to dismiss it as an aircraft (one of ours, anyway).  several minutes later, it began to move again, reversing direction at about the same speed, moving north, until it stopped again at almost due north.  i was now a bit higher in the sky, but seemed farther away, higher in elevation, not as bright, and even more varied in intensity.  it again remained motionless for several minutes, but continued dimming.  at the point when i knew i was about to lose sight of it, it became white for a moment, and then it was gone.  the incident lasted about 15-20 minutes.

one week later, december 31st, i was alone outside and noticed a bright red light on the eastern horizon.  we���d heard fireworks earlier, and although my first reaction was that it was the same object we���d seen the week before, i tried to explain it to myself as the trail of an aerial firework before it explodes.  but it continued moving at a steady trajectory, was getting brighter and moving overhead.  i ran inside to call my wife and grab my camera and we both watched the rest of it.  it was brighter than the last time, more directly overhead, moving at about the same speed.  it moved for about a minute.  then it stopped at about 60 degrees above the horizon just east of south, and over about thirty seconds dimmed out.  both times as it disappeared the feeling was that it was moving away, but it didn���t change position in the sky.  there is modest light pollution in our area, but both nights were very clear.  the video is from the second event.  it is too high in the sky to get a point of reference, but during about the first half of this it is in motion, during the second half (about the time i moved the camera down to shift position) it was motionless.  it's with a cheap camera, no zoom.  having looked now, we've noticed many recent videos of what appears to us to be the same thing.
content.summary: Two sightings a week apart, orange-red light

content.detailedDescription: In beebe arkansas 1000 birds fell mysteriously from the sky. read about it on yahoo news and ky3.Com.  maybe they hit a spaceship cloaked which caused that many deaths. the truth is out there. its such a weird happening and maybe ufo related.
content.summary: 1000 birds fall mysteriously from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting on jan. 2, 2011 at approx.  5:57 am cst.  object appeared as star like, 4th or 5th magnitude.  first appeared to the east at approximately 30 degrees elevation, moving to the sse.  disappeared 5-6 seconds later at approximately 20 degrees elevation.  very fast moving!  much faster than a satellite or aircraft, but not as fast as a meteor (didn't look like a meteor at all).  no course deviations, no navigation or anti-collision lights, and no sound.

sighting entered in to cms by ky.Asd due to the fact that this report was email directly to me today.
content.summary: Object appeared as star like, 4th or 5th magnitude.  first appeared to the east at approximately 30 degrees elevation, moving to the sse.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of january 1, 2011 i picked up my girlfriend from her place of work, off of s. clinton st. across from the doylestown train station.  the time was approximately 10:25pm est.  we proceeded to drive south on clinton street making our way towards hart ave.  while continuing down the hill i noticed numerous bright objects in the eastern sky.  it was immediately evident that this was at the least something uncommon or unusual.  we made a left turn at hart ave. and pulled into a parking lot behind a bank.  at this point we both exited the vehicle and stood in the parking lot to get a better look.  the time at this point must have been about 10:27pm est.

initially we saw about twenty of these objects moving relatively slow from south to north across the eastern sky.  they were following a semi circular trajectory, appearing out of the dark in the southeastern sky, moving towards our position slightly while continuing north.  after covering much the length of the sky, they began gaining altitude and moving away from us before disappearing again into the darkness.  they continued in a constant stream like this for about ten minutes, with new ones appearing in the south east as they disappeared to the northeast.  for the most part, at any point in time there was somewhere between 15-20 of these in the sky at once.  they all followed the same general trajectory but individualy they carried there own paths(almost as though they were travelling in formation and connected by a string).  as they made their way across the sky, most of them maintained their relative positions to each other.  however some of them were bobbing around.  they all seemed to maintain a constant speed the entire time.  at 10:36 a placed a phone call to mother for her to meet me in town and bring a camera.  at about this time the lights started to appear in fewer numbers.  eventually dwindling to about 2 or 3.  finally the last one went across at about 10:40.  of interested note, shortly before the last one went across the sky my girlfriend and i heard the sound of a jet, but did not visualize any planes.  

at no point in time did the objects make any type of noise, additionally, they moved unlike any aerial manned objects i have ever seen.  

the objects themselves looked like balls of fire.  some were slightly larger and brighter than others.  they ranged in color from a deep red to bright yellowish-orange.  however all had an appearance similar to that of a campfire at a distance.  they almost looked like bioluminescent deep sea creatures moving in the pitch dark of the ocean.   

it is difficult for me to judge the altitude of these objects, i can say they appeared to be flying much lower than a typical commercial liner.

initially when we first exited the vehicle, i freaked out on my girlfriend because she didn't know how to use her crummy camera phone(blackberry), however we did get it working and managed to snap a couple pictures.  the pictures by no means do justice to what we saw, and the actual objects appeared much brigher, larger, and in greater numbers.

i have read stories and seen videos of the chinese lanterns, and though they look similar, i stuggle to understand how they would appear/disappear, change color/size, and follow a semi cirular trajectory.  i am also unaware of any local group that releases such lanterns.  

additionally, there was some light fog with an overcast sky.  it was difficult for me to tell how low the cloud cover was.  about 30 minutes after arriving back home it began to rain.
content.summary: Witnessed approximately 70 flaming balls make there way across the sky in a semi circular arc before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were driving home in the early morning, and entering the town of portsmouth, iowa. we were about half a mile from the town when i noticed a green light, similar to an 'orb', in the sky. it seemed to be far away, but within a mile of the earth's ground. after a few seconds of hovering, it started moving upwards, and took a sharp turn towards the ground where it made a curved path towards the ground. but not curved towards the earth like an asteroid/comet/meteor would make when being pulled in by gravity. the object made a curved motion going the opposite direction of gravity. after a few seconds the object completely disappeared. there were no trees or hills that it could have disappeared over, so it was unmistakenably just 'disappearing into thin air.'

this isn't the first time we have seen something paranormal in this area, but nothing to these measures.

both of us were very emotional over the object, and could barely speak about what we saw. we both agreed that this is something we can't speak to anyone about, except maybe a professional, as most would dismiss this as being 'crazy', or something along those lines.
content.summary: Hovering green light slowly moves upward, and takes a sharp turn towards the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I see it right now...Don't know who to contact.  the object is stationary, very bright and "flickering".  it's changing colors fromblue to green to red to white. it's very distant and i'm viewing it through a newtonian telescope. it's been there roughly 15 minutes without motion.  it's distance won't let me get a clear outline as to it's shape.  the closest i could discern is some kind of irregular triangular shape. it's not a star!
content.summary: Very bright, distant, color changing object. stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I went to bed around 11pm, sometime during the night i was woken up by three creatures in a brightly light egg shaped room, the light was coming out of the walls ceiling and floor with a soft luminous glow, they were speaking to me as they woke me before i opened my eyes, so that i might not be afraid (they said & i quote: "do not be afraid or scared, we love you and care for you")in gentle penetrating words that echoed in my head and funnily enough not in my ears. they introduced themselves as "one two & three, one was on my left two was behind the top of my head behind me and three was standing to my right. when i opened my eyes, i was shocked, yet there is this strange familiarity with them, as if they have known me all my life. i was naked (i wear pj's to bed)i felt dazed, even drunkish, yet i don't drink) and i went to sit up & two placed it's huge hand underneath my neck & back to help support me, they were chatting insesantly using telepathy yet i could hear them talking in clicks & pops sort of like crickets chirping but quicker and more complex & meaningful, they said they were looking for signs of tampering on a genetic & physical lvl, three had a device in his hand and starting at my right foot he brought the hand held device up my right leg about ten cm above my skin, he tilted the screen so that i could see too, the surface of the device looked like liquid metal as i watched the screen i could see beneath my skin. three, flicked through the different resoutions so i could see the bone and muscle tissue or just the nerves & vascular, they reminded me of ants,these people. their deep dark eyes their tiny noses & mouths, their powdery white skin that reminded me of the roughness yet smoothness of shark skin they where tall & thin yet strong. i was going to say where am i? when the walls, ceiling & floor changed to match my thoughts just like it was projected somehow from outside the craft and i could see we were high over my suburb and i could see the blue cross on top of the church, up on the hill i live at the foot of, i could see all the city lights below twinkling like a million candles...These three aliens didn't have to wake me up and show me all this stuff (i would have actually prefered they hadn't)however what is done, cannot be undone. i know for sure, that these particular aliens would never hurt us, i woke late for college by almost three hours and i could not help realise that this was not like any dream i'd ever had before, woken by creatures from the stars, as if! i kept telling myself it was only a dream, that none of it is real...Unfortunately, who am i kidding other than myself? i've never had a dream like it & haven't had one since. i hope you enjoyed my adventure, feel free to contact me if you have any questions about my experience in regard to this event preferably email,though if you can get through on the phone that's okay too.
my conclusion is: a. there is more than one race of alien with us, b. a faction is helping us. c. and a carnivore reptile race, maybe a small group is consuming warm blooded lifeforms through terror and collection of pituitary fluid (dimethyl...) what religion calls the beast.
but i could be wrong. thanks for having a spot to share experiences, i know in my heart that what happened to me was not just a dream, i can still hear them talking sometimes at night when it's really quiet. tip chirp tip tip tip chirp getting louder and louder as it comes closer and closer from way up in the sky. they're tracking us.
content.summary: From inside the craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was a child of about 8 years of age.  i had strong religious beliefs and spoke to god often.  in retrospect i think this was partially due to a personal crisis, after which i became withdrawn and sad throughout the rest of childhood.  i often had trouble getting to sleep, or waking for periods of the night.  at such times i would talk to god.  this particular night i became very distressed, and was crying and begging god to help me - to let me see him,  or take me up to heaven now.  i stared up into the stars and asked something like "are you there? can you hear me?... please listen to me...��������� etc.  my eyes noticed a particular star seeming to twinkle more than others,  my window faced north, and the star was somewhat to my right (north/east) and well up into the night sky.  i asked "is that you making the star move?  please show me something to be sure.  i need to see you , even if i have to die."    
at that point, the "star" moved visibly toward me, clearly moving at a steady rate, with purpose and toward earth, toward me.  i thought perhaps i was about to see an angel.
 my tears dried and chilled as i opened the louver windows to get a better look and be sure i wasn't imagining things. suddenly, what i had thought was a star (or came from one) was right outside my window , less than 2' from my face.  it was a perfect blue sphere of radiant energy.  i did not notice any heat, and was too little to know if what i was feeling was some kind of energy from it, or whether it was my own bodily response to shock. the orb emitted a very subtle vibrating sound, a quiet humming is the closest i can approximate, but it seemed organic rather than mechanical.  the orb seemed to slightly contract and expand, in an out ������ or so.  it looked like nothing  i had ever seen or heard of.  it was a beautiful blue infused by white light energy that was like millions of pulsating tiny strings or rays of electricity or blue fire.  i was both shocked and riveted.  i stared at it hovering outside my window for several seconds, and finally formed the thought "is this what angels really look like?" 
at that point, as if it heard my thought, it passed through the window.  though somehow substantive itself, it did not change as it glided right through the panes of glass into my room, hovering right next to me about a foot above my mattress.  i backed up a little (i was on a top bunk bed, so there wasn't much room to move), because i had the feeling i probably shouldn't touch it.  it came along on the right, beside my head and then began to change shape.  as it moved slowly and deliberately (parallel to me)  down the right side of my bed, it took the shape of a falcon or hawk... it was still composed of the same blueish light, but it was more difuse, a little less bright as it took on an expanded and different form.  it seemed to be trying to communicate something important  to me.  i got the impression this is something i should pay close attention to, and always remember.  i also had the impression it was ���������thinking that to me.��������� then as it continued slowly on, it changed and took the shape of some kind of dog, sort of wild looking, but not a wolf or coyote.  then it began to change again, but as it did, it went right down over the edge of the bed.  i thought it had disappeared, but suddenly it reared back up over the end of the mattress, appearing as a cobra with its neck flared out fully, sort of standing up as they do.  that was the first time i really got scared.  it was the suddenness of reappearing in another form that scared me.  
then it was gone.  i waited several minutes staring into the dark room in fear.  i finally got the courage to clamber down to the floor and run to the bathroom to turn on the light. i had no idea what to make of it, but assumed god had sent a messenger and it was up to me to figure out the message.  i had the idea it would become clear later in life, and that for now i had been given some kind of answer, maybe even a promise.  

it never occurred to me that this could be a ufo. whatever it was, it seemed to be an individual.  recently however,  i have seen some documentaries about ufos and also about paranormal investigations which mentioned several types of encounters similar to mine.
i also came across some ancient hindu descriptions that may be a similar thing called a blue pearl. 
very recently i have been watching the series "ancient aliens," and some of the content really intrigued me with regards to understanding my blue orb visit.  i ended up searching the inter net, and finding out that the egyptians had star maps indicating the place of our origins associated with orion, and the pleiades. 
in examining details of graphic depictions of these, i learned that ra (who seeded the earth) was shown as a man with a falcon head and an orb above it.  also, anubis was another god, who was represented as a man with the head of a jackal. (finally, i found a wild dog that looked like the one i saw that night, it was large like a wolf, but more aquiline and not furry as a wolf,  and even more intelligent than a fox or coyote). anubis is associated with the traveling of the soul between life, death and rebirth; he is also the one depicted as the judge of souls (shown weighing the heart of the deceased against a feather, meaning the heart must be light and unburdened in order to pass into a new life).  last, i found out there is a goddess represented by the cobra.  her name is wad-jet.  she is associated with the colors green and blue.  she protects other deities and the pharaoh. she is shown either as a woman with a cobra head, cobra with a woman's head, simply a cobra, or an orb with the head and tail of the cobra wrapped around (positioned above the head of whatever deity she is protecting).  she is shown either at the foot of the pharaoh or above his head, and her symbol became part of the pharaoh's crown for that reason.

it may be very tempting to assume i���������m not a rational person, and that this was simply a vivid dream or wild imagination.  i know it was an actual occurrence.  i am a very rational person, and have never had any type of psychosis.  i have had other unusual experiences in my life, but none so compelling as this one.  i am an artist, retired government analyst, beekeeper, and jack of many other trades.  

i would like to know if you have heard of cases similar to this.  i would also like to know if those in your organization have ideas about what this entity was trying to convey to me.  over the years, i came to think that perhaps the animals represented three stages in my life: childhood, adulthood, and old age.  (because of my art training, i thought perhaps the falcon/hawk was a symbol of my relative isolation during childhood, the dog a symbol of loyalty and commitment representing  the years raising a family, and the cobra symbolizing wisdom (as in some eastern culture)to represent  the years after menopause.  this was the only message i could extract from it.
however, i have begun to wonder.  after learning of star maps associated with specific entities from the stars, that take the form of the falcon, jackal and cobra ��������� i have begun to rethink god���������s message and messenger(s).  seen in that context and reviewing the order of events, it seems i may have encountered a being from another star system.  this entity transformed from an orb, to a falcon or hawk (ra the god who seeded earth, to the jackal (anubis, the god of traveling between life and death and rebirth), and then to a cobra (wad-jet, protector of other gods, often appearing as an orb above them).  what could that mean?  i was begging to see god, or at least an angel, and i was answered with this being of light.  if  i  were to pursue the line of thought that this could in fact be a direct answer from those who seeded this earth, i am still left wondering what is the message. 
 i insist on clinging to the idea that there is a message because the orb didn���������t speak, but it did convey thought to me, and appeared to perceive my thoughts.  i am sure this is something i was meant to ponder, while assuring me that there was more life beyond this one, and that i was heard when i spoke my thoughts to god.
orb, falcon, jackal, cobra��������� orb, ra (aka horus), anubis, wadjet���������  perhaps the orb was my guardian angel  (angel, entity��������� whatever; it was a benevolent being) carrying a message.   the message is either about  actual entities ra, anubis and wadjet; or these represent a picture of human context in relation to our creators or ancestors from the stars.  if the latter were the case, it could mean that ra indicates the seeding of the earth and/or the  present life i am living; that anubis represents a guardian to allow passage onto another life, provided one is spiritually prepared��������� or maybe even a go  between the worlds, whom one may give and receive information through; and then the last, wadjet, a reassurance of protection, and perhaps the source of the orb.
i don���������t know��������� this isn���������t getting clearer yet.  perhaps some of those in your organization who subscribe to the ideas presented in the series ���������ancient aliens��������� would be able to shed more light upon this.  or maybe you can tell me if there are cases similar to mine��������� i do not think this is like the marfon lights or whatever they���������re called.  this thing was a living being of some kind, very powerful and good.
also, i don���������t know much about astronomy.  based on the fact that my window faced north, and that the ���������star��������� came down from the sky at say 2 or 3 o���������clock (north/east and up about midway from horizon to straight up���������) is there any way to know where it came from?  unfortunately, i don���������t really recall the time of year, but i remember when it was all over with, the louver windows were very cold when i closed them��������� in southern california, that would seem to be winter.  i also am uncertain of the exact hour.  i do know it was several hours after me and my siblings were sent to bed (9pm), and then about 11 i heard my mother go to the bathroom, brush her teeth and go to bed, and then i heard my dad watch tv until after some comedy show that ended around midnight��������� so i guess maybe it was 1:00 a.M.

there are more things i would share about this if someone seems to take it seriously and have an understanding and information that might be helpful.  but i���������m already way out on a limb sharing this.
assuming someone has read this, thank you for your time.

i am reluctant to give a blanket release of info to 3rd parties.  however, if someone specifically wishes to respond to this message, i may be willing to give a partial release, if it is both necessary & beneficial.
content.summary: Blue orb appeared to descend from stars and come right outside my window, and then into my room. it was pure energy and about the size of a volleyball.  it moved along beside me and changed shapes 3 times.

content.detailedDescription: Observed 8 sphere shaped orange light traveling in a horizantal direction. two traveled together the others approx. 1 to 2 min apart. from the binoculars they appeared as orange lights. no shape to them, definatley not airplanes or any sort of rockets. no vapor trails behind them. no blinking lights what so ever, to fast to be ballons or even helicopters. just wanted to let you know. not sure if it might have been military plasma weapon test but very suspicious.  it ocurred at 12:109 am on 01/01/11
content.summary: 8 spheres

content.detailedDescription: Observed 8 sphere shaped orange light traveling in a horizantal direction. two traveled together the others approx. 1 to 2 min apart. from the binoculars they appeared as orange lights. no shape to them, definatley not airplanes or any sort of rockets. no vapor trails behind them. no blinking lights what so ever, to fast to be ballons or even helicopters. just wanted to let you know. not sure if it might have been military plasma weapon test but very suspicious.  it ocurred at 12:109 am on 01/01/11
content.summary: 8 spheres

content.detailedDescription: Well i was sitting down in one of the rooms.Actually i always record 80's music video's,so i remember watching that.Now for some reason i just looked outside the window.First let me tell you this.There is a cotton field about 100 feet away from my grandma's house.So i looked toward that and out from a tree comes this orange orb orb.It was flyinjg over the fields.It came out of the tree and then started spawning these other light!!!!!!!!!!It was so quick it looked as it were shooting these other orange orbs out of it.I went crazy.I ran out and told my grandma who was hanging clothes outside.She did not believe me.I then went on the roof to see if it was still flying.This object was an orange orb.It was not bright.Lost sight of the object when i ran outside to report it to my skeptical grandma :)
content.summary: Orange orb

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were driving down i-30 headed eastbound. we were passing cooper street in arlington texas, when i noticed an orb in the sky.  the orb was very bright and a fair distance away from us. i kept looking for a blinking light to figure out if this was an airplane. i asked my girlfriend if she could tell if it was "blinking". at that exact moment my girlfriend let out a gasp and we both noticed that the object had changed complete directions, done a 180 degree turn and was now headed in the opposite direction. the orb sped up and was flying at an exceptionally fast rate of speed. i couldn't believe my eyes.  thank god my girlfriend was there to back up my story. we both experienced a low flying object, brightly lit, changing direction in mid flight pattern and flying at an extremely fast speed. by the way i should mention that the flight pattrn that the orb took was originally headed north and then took a turn and headed south and passed right over cowboy's stadium in arlington texas. the orb vanished from our line of sight behind a building, when we drove around the building the orb was well gone.
content.summary: Speedy orb flying at high speed, turned directions and flew in the opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home with my wife down i-20 about to cross over into sc when she said "what is that?". i looked out her window and saw what i thought to be flares. i stopped the car out of curiosity and got out to get a better look. i noticed they werent falling like flares and were in fact moving into a formation. when we first spotted them they were in a cluster kind of floating off the ground ( maybe a few thousand feet). then they started one by one heading north up the savannah river. they moved off slowly and silently and disappeared after a few mins of viewing. it was raining lightly and there was heavy clous cover so they couldnt have been far off the ground. no noise, very strange event. called the news and they said we werent the only ones calling it in.
content.summary: 7 orange balls, in cluster than single file

content.detailedDescription:
Went ouside and saw an object  in the sky, at first thougt it was a plane but there was no noise. it moved from the south and was traveling north. it was moving at about the speed of a small plane. 
when it got more into the northern sky, it stopped, for about a minute, then it continued moving northerly and disappeared.I thought it looked like a boomerang with red lights on the outer edges.
content.summary: Had red lights on the outer ecge

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of january 1st at approx. 8:40pm, my family and i and a couple of friends were over for a small fire and talking in backyard.  i leaned back in chair and looked up at the sky when i saw what i thought to be just a satelite shooting across night sky.  after closer examination i noticed object was closer than that of a satelite.  it was a dark("shadowy" like)rounded triangular shape with pinkish orange aura around it. it was traveling at what i figured to be a high rate of speed south to north direction in port st. lucie, fl.  the entire incident lasted only 10 to 15 seconds.  in this timespan i asked my wife,"what is that?".  she replied,"oh my gosh!" and asked are friends if they could see it.  they agreed that they could see it as it flew out of view behind trees.  we all were excited but calm and believed we had seen a ufo. we talked briefly of what had happened and what we should do.  i decided to report it and came across mufon on internet.
content.summary: Family and friends viewed ufo flying quickly across sky in port st. lucie, fl on january 1st.
